description.value: The venom injected by your fangs disorients your foes. A creature damaged by your @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.actionsxprpg.Anadi Venom]{Anadi Venom} must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)|traits:poison] save against your class or spell DC, whichever is higher, or become @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.conditionitems.Flat-Footed]{Flat-Footed} for 1 round.
